name: Feng - Death Wasp
description:
-- Web player disclaimer --

Full screening the game causes wonky graphics as the aspect ratio becomes changed from the intended 4:3 ratio.

This game is a submission to 32bit Jam 2021!

Feng: Death Wasp is a 2.5D platformer with a focus on movement. The game is titled after the protagonist, Feng.

Trained in the martial art of the “Death Wasp” style, Feng has come to the illustrious Mi mountain to eradicate the disciples of their rival school. However, when he arrives at the entrance of the school’s temple, he discovers that the students of the “Quiet Bee” style are already waiting for him. Feng gets ready for all-out war!

- Tight platforming action!

- Fight your way through countless bees!

- Enjoy retro graphics and an original soundtrack!
